item.title: Publications
item.description: Work in progress Purpose, Practice and Teacher Transformation, An RCT of a “Learning to Learn” Teacher Training in Ugandan Secondary Schools (with Moustafa El-Kashlan, Stefan Faridani and Vesall Nourani) [AEARCTR-0012347].
